tweet: UPDATE: #Cardano OBFT hard fork successfully completed! 🚀 👏 🥳   Cardano recently underwent a mainnet hard fork (=software protocol update) on 20-02-2020, during epoch 176, to pave the way for the "#Shelley" mainnet release.  https://t.co/Uemla5AKoG

The Ouroboros BFT update went through successfully, a really positive next step in the development of the Cardano platform. Thanks to the hard work of all of those involved at IOHK, and we are looking forward to the exciting months ahead. #Cardano #CardanoCommunity
Congrats #cardano!!! Hardfork successful! Now, the network is running OBFT! 🙌 @emurgo_io @InputOutputHK @CardanoStiftung

Cardano's proof-of-stake (PoS) protocol has some key differences from a delegated proof-of-stake (DPoS) protocol.  In this blog, we explain how #Cardano's #Ouroboros consensus algorithm provides a more distributed and secure network than DPoS 👇   https://t.co/NdkpTAGkXE

We have now entered the "OBFT" era. #OBFT stands for "#Ouroboros Byzantine Fault Tolerant".   ⚠️$ADA holders DO NOT need to take any action during or after the hard fork.  ⚠️NO new #ada coins are created and/or cannot be claimed. Beware of scammers telling you different! #Cardano
We've gathered together this week's stats right here on the Shelley Incentivized Testnet, with some more of your feedback:  https://t.co/olKUFDHyER #Cardano #Shelley  https://t.co/QO6B6hK8Q7

One of the many reasons for #Cardano success is the methodology of development. Cardano is built as a mission-critical project so the quality is probably the best we can achieve and there is a little room for bugs and unexpected behavior.    https://t.co/gmDCiQF26E  #crypto $ADA

The latest #CardanoCommunity newsletter is out! Subscribe to it on  https://t.co/WozOUi8hTW to read about all the updates from across the project and from the #CardanoFoundation, #EMURGO and #IOHK!  https://t.co/qbfLqWskP7 #Cardano
Waiting for the integration of #Shelley testnet into #Cardano Mainnet. Cardano already is a big name in facilitating a robust scientific approach with improvements across the board.  @Cardano

Here is the latest update from Dimitris on the Shelley Incentivized Testnet development. Thanks for the community's continued support and feedback:   https://t.co/rdjZQFaH2u #Cardano #CardanoCommunity
IOHK celebrates OBFT hard-fork.  It is done. No complications.  #Cardano has successfully made the first step towards the Shelley era.

I have received many questions about #Cardano 's #Ouroboros Protocol. There is a growing interest in the #Shelley  #ITN   If interested, I have this article explaining Ouroboros in simple terms:    https://t.co/jzO7CvIdNs  @IOHK_Charles @CardanoStiftung @InputOutputHK

Awesome Cardano update video with Hashoshi @hashoshi4  about the ITN staking and we talked his experience with writing smart contracts with solidity along with other subjects. Always a pleasure to speak with such a knowledgeable guy. @Cardano #Cardano #Ada #Shelley

#Cardano is unstoppable this year. Shelley is coming and then Goguen after. Soon we'll be asking: "When Voltaire?" Exciting times are ahead...  $ADA #Crypto #blockchain #bitcoin $btc  https://t.co/ZQj9gJylsz

🥳A big thanks and congrats for this massive milestone: #Cardano OBFT is a fact! 🥳  This upgrade is an important preparatory step towards moving over to the #Shelley mainnet next! (Ps: no need to do anything with your $ada for this, beware of scams!) #Ouroboros #IOHK #Blockchain
